Title: Includes whether an individual was in custody on the death certificate for such individual
Summary: Includes whether an individual was in custody on the death certificate for such individual; requires such information to be included in the publicly available statistics published on the website of the department of health.
LawCode: Amd ยง4141, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to including whether an individual was in custody on the death certificate for such individual
